attributes.action: health lottery and goverment  funding for genetic and neurological  of ADHD  and aspergers
attributes.additional_details:
My main goal of my petition is get the Department of health to make the necessary funding from health lottery and Government funding into ADHD AND Aspergers research through genetic studies and neurological research for treatments like

Mindfulness training
Cognitive Behavioural therapy
Moral behaviour and social reasoning computer training based symbols and moral role play
Soclal Empathy training facial expressions computer training programmes
Clinical  trials L theaiine and 5ht supplements  and St John wort.  6ht 7ht Serontonin reup take therapies
Oxytocin vapressin
Serotonion re uptake through diet
Speech therapy
Goal Setting and Kinesology
Anger managerment therapy
Meditation like yoga and ti chi exericise
Frontal lobe behaviour and cingulate gryus  and amygdala and hippocampus stimulation programmes with behaviour therapies  and cerebellum based therapies
Gene therapies serotonin and dompmine receptors oxytocin and vapressin
